title: Bug 24877: Cannot get file extension from SWT FileDialog
description: Bug 24877: The SWT FileDialog does not provide a way to retrieve the selected file extension. This makes it difficult to determine the correct file extension to append to the file name.
OB: When using the SWT FileDialog, there is no method or property available to get the selected file extension.
EB: The SWT FileDialog should have a method or property that allows retrieving the selected file extension.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open the FileDialog and select the '.zip' file type from the 'Save as type' dropdown. Then, enter a file name (e.g., 'test') without manually specifying the file extension. The dialog should not automatically append the '.zip' extension to the file name.
